string_table.str: Collect cards and build decks to deploy units directly to the battlefield.
Hold the most Stronghold minibases at the end of the match to win. Unlimited resources.
Change the settings for your custom match.
Select a map for your custom match.
Waiting for the host to proceed to leader selection.
Set the additional population increase each time a new Stronghold is built for this Strongholds match.
Toggle Leader Powers on or off for this match.
Toggle Leader Powers on or off for this match.
Toggle the fog of war on or off for this match.
Toggle the fog of war on or off for this match.
Set the amount of power resource you start the match with.
Set the amount of supply resource you start the match with.
Modify the cooldown rate for all units' special abilities in this match.
Modify the cooldown rate for all units' special abilities in this match.
Destroy all enemy bases to win.
PLAYER DEFEAT ON LOSS OF HQ
With this on, players will be removed from the game if their HQ is destroyed and not replaced before the timer ends.
PLAYER DEFEAT ON LOSS OF HQ TIMER
If a player loses their HQ, they will be removed from the match when this amount of time runs out.
Capture and hold Control Towers to score points. Reach the maximum score first to win.
With this activated, Minibases count as HQs. The defeat timer will not start ticking down as long as the player still has a Minibase or HQ active.
Set the starting population for all players in this Strongholds match.
Build and hold the most Strongholds at the end of the match to win. All players have unlimited resources.
Set the scoring limit for this round of Domination. The first team to reach this score wins the match.
Set the time limit for this Strongholds match.
Select the game type for this match.
Add an AI player to the match.
Choose your side in the match.
Select your team and add AI players.
Edit settings for the AI player.
Add an AI Player to the match.
Standard free-for-all multiplayer mode; eliminate all opponents' base structures to win.
Your PC does not meet the minimum requirements to run Halo Wars 2. You may observe performance issues or have a less-than-optimal experience on this system.
Fight for domination of Control Towers located on the map.
Go head to head in an intense 1v1 battle of wits and strategy.
Team up for a tactical 2v2 battle, our most competitive tier of play.
Experience the glorious chaos of 3v3 play as troops collide across the battlefield.
TOURNAMENT RULES IN EFFECT: All Blitz cards are set to the same level.
Team up in an unranked, random game mode to take on the AI.
Team up in an unranked, random game mode to take on the AI.
3v3 unranked Strongholds match, with unlimited resources and all upgrades.
Test your strategic skill in an unranked Deathmatch. Last player standing wins!
Work together in an unranked 2v2 or 3v3 Deathmatch to annihilate the enemy team.
Team up against other players to complete the match objective.
Matchmaking ban rules are in effect.
CSR ranks enabled. Pair up with another commander in a ranked 2v2 Deathmatch to annihilate the enemy team.
Pair up with another commander in an unranked 2v2 Deathmatch to annihilate the enemy team.
CSR ranks enabled. Test your strategic skill in a ranked Deathmatch. Last player standing wins.
Set the difficulty of the AI for this match.
Select an AI Leader for this match.
CSR ranks enabled. Work together in a ranked 3v3 Deathmatch to annihilate the enemy team.
Change the difficulty level of your Firefight match. Playing on a higher difficulty level greatly increases score bonus.
Review the difficulty level for this Firefight match. Playing on a higher difficulty level greatly increases score bonus.
Search for an online game of Firefight.
Change the settings for your Firefight match
Review the settings for this Firefight match
Non-default matches won't be posted to leaderboards
Waiting for the host to proceed to leader selection
Set the base amount of damage enemy units can inflict.
Set the base amount of damage enemy units can inflict.
Set the base amount of health enemy units have.
Set the base amount of health enemy units have.
Set the health for the Terminus, the Forerunner structure you have to protect.
Set the health for the Terminus, the Forerunner structure you have to protect.
Set the starting round. Each round consists of five waves and ends with a boss.
Set the starting round. Each round consists of five waves and ends with a boss.
Set the time between each wave spawning.
Set the time between each wave spawning.
Create a private game of Firefight, play solo or cooperatively with friends.
Anders' scientific expertise allows her to field Sentinel units and makes all of her upgrades cheaper and faster.
Anders' scientific expertise allows her to field Sentinel units and support her forces with Forerunner tech.
Atriox focuses on a cunning and defensive style supported by an advanced economy and the power to make units temporarily invulnerable.
Atriox focuses on a cunning and defensive style, supported by heavy cover and invulnerability powers.
A Hunter colony who specializes in powerful frontline units and healing.
As Captain of the Spirit of Fire, Cutter can send in powerful orbital support, drop specialized UNSC units, and enhance currently deployed units.
As Captain of the Spirit of Fire, Cutter can send in powerful orbital support and specialist UNSC units.
Decimus is a berserker who relies on hard-hitting rushes and a unique power to siphon his enemies’ health when attacking.
Decimus is a berserker who relies on hard-hitting rushes while siphoning their health away.
Isabel improves the effectiveness of vehicles using her database of the latest UNSC tech, and employs hacking and distraction powers in battle.
Isabel deploys the latest UNSC vehicle tech to great advantage and distracts the enemy with AI holograms.
Johnson focuses on a deadly frontline of combat mechs and battlefield defenses.
Johnson focuses on a deadly frontline of combat mechs and battlefield defenses.
Play with a random Banished leader
Play with a random UNSC leader
The Shipmaster favors stealth and cloaking powers, teleportation tactics, and rapid assaults against his foes.
The Shipmaster favors stealth, teleportation tactics, and rapid assaults against his foes.
The Arbiter's fierce loyalty to the Sangheili means he uses Elite-focused units, with unique stasis-based powers.
The active profile has changed. Returning to the Start screen.
You are currently not allowed to participate in the Halo Wars 2 Open Beta.
The Halo Wars 2 Open Beta has not started yet.
The latest game update has been downloaded. Please restart the game.
The latest game update has been downloaded. Please exit and restart the game to apply changes.
A mandatory update is required. Press continue to visit the Store.
You cannot open this pack because you have maxxed out the cards it can award. Try again after new content has been released. A level update or new cards will refresh this pack.
Cannot access content from the server. Try again later.
Only the squad leader can launch this.
You can't play a solo Firefight while there are other players in your squad.
You can't play the solo campaign while there are other players in your squad.
You cannot continue. Your partner has returned to the main menu.
Are you sure you would like to delete this save file?
Could not start the Co-Op Campaign.
Are you sure you want to load this save? The existing autosave may be overwritten.
Are you sure you want to to start this mission? The existing autosave may be overwritten.
Invite a friend from the Friends tab in the Squad Panel.
Are you sure you want to start a New Game? The existing autosave may be overwritten.
Are you sure you want to overwrite this save file?
Are you sure you want to load this save? Any unsaved progress will be lost.
Are you sure you want to quit the mission? Any unsaved progress will be lost.
Are you sure you want to restart the level? Any unsaved progress will be lost.
Are you sure you want to restart from the last checkpoint? Any unsaved progress will be lost.
You cannot start Co-Op Campaign while squad members are still in a match.
Are you sure you want to restart the level?
Are you sure you want to restart from the last checkpoint?
There are too many players in the squad to start Co-Op Campaign.
Only the squad leader can access or change this feature.
The latest game configuration data has been downloaded. The game will now restart.
An error occurred while downloading the latest game configuration data. Online features may be restricted.
An error occurred while downloading the latest game configuration data. Online features may be restricted. Do you want to retry?
Unable to retrieve the playlists. The Halo Wars 2 online services may be temporarily unavailable.
Are you sure you want to join the other player's game? Any unsaved progress will be lost.
Do you want to bring your squad with you? Not everyone may be able to switch if the destination is full or has restrictive join options.
Are you sure you want to kick this player?
Are you sure you want to leave this match?
Are you sure you want to leave the current squad?
You need to be in the lobby to participate in the match.
Are you sure you want to change profile?
There is a problem with your network connection or with Halo Wars 2's online services.
Unable to connect to the Xbox Live services. The Ethernet cable is unplugged or there is no network connectivity.
An Xbox Live Gold membership or permission for online gameplay is required.
An Xbox Live gamer profile is required.
Unable to connect to the Xbox Live services.
You are not connected to Xbox Live. Please check your connection.
You are not connected to Xbox Live. The Ethernet cable is unplugged or there is no network connectivity.
Your gamer profile is not signed into Xbox Live. Do you want to sign in now?
This account is already connected to the game on another device. Please disconnect from the other device to launch the game here.
The Halo Wars 2 servers are currently unavailable.
The connection to the online services has been lost. The Ethernet cable has been unplugged or network connectivity has been lost.
You have lost connection to the gameplay session.
You have been kicked due to inactivity during gameplay.
You have been kicked due to falling behind too far for too long in the game simulation.
The connection to the online services has been lost.
You have lost your connection to Xbox Live.
The game has gone out of sync with the other players.
You are no longer connected to the squad.
You have been kicked from the squad.
%1 has declined to launch the mission.
%1 would like to play the Co-Op mission %2 on %3. Do you accept?
Are you sure you want to start a game with imbalanced teams?
The selected map is too small for the team size.
You cannot start while squad members are still in a match.
You cannot start a game with this team setup.
Press the key or button you would like to assign.
Your controller has been disconnected. Please reconnect and press A to continue.
Are you sure you want to exit Halo Wars 2?
The resolution has changed. Would you like to keep this setting?
Your squad has left the Co-Op Campaign.
Someone in your squad has left the Firefight.
Your partner has resigned from the Co-Op Campaign.
A player in your squad has an invalid Favorite deck.
A player in your squad does not have the correct data for this playlist.
Not all game features are available when using a guest profile.
A guest profile cannot be used to play Halo Wars 2.
Unable to join the squad chosen by your squad leader.
Unable to join the squad. It is full or locked.
Unable to join the squad. It is full.
Unable to join the squad. It is full, locked or unreachable.
Unable to join the squad. Could not connect to the squad leader.
Unable to join the squad. You have a different version than the squad leader.
Unable to join the squad. The server has not been allocated.
Unable to join the squad. Unable to connect to the server.
Failed to launch the game. Please try again or you may need to leave and rejoin the squad.
Leaderboard season information failed to load
Unable to launch the store in order to purchase this leader. Try again later...
You cannot start matchmaking. A member of your squad is banned.
You cannot start matchmaking. A member of your squad is banned. The remaining ban time is: %1
This playlist cannot be played with your current squad.
A player you were matched with has disconnected. Restarting search.
Your squad is too big for the selected playlist.
You cannot start matchmaking while squad members are still in a match.
The selected playlist is no longer valid. Please select another.
An error with the matchmaking service has occurred.
Matchmaking is currently unavailable or experiencing issues.
Are you sure you want to start a game with imbalanced teams?
Failed to retrieve the Message Of The Day. The Halo Wars 2 services could be unavailable or there is an issue with your connection.
Are you sure you want to leave this match? You will lose this match, leave your squad and may receive a penalty for repeated disconnections.
There are too many players in the squad to continue.
Too many spectators for this Game setup.
No profile selected. Do you want to proceed?
Please choose a valid profile to proceed.
There are not enough players in the squad to continue.
Are you sure you want to join the other player's game? Any unsaved progress on the active profile will be lost.
The game has gone out of sync with the other players.
You cannot play Solo Blitz Firefight while in a squad with other players.
You cannot play a single-player campaign while in a squad with other players.
You cannot play solo while in a squad with other players.
Cannot save progress without a valid profile. Do you want to retry?
Are you sure you want to delete this deck?
Unable to start Quick Match. There is a problem with your Favorite deck. Update your Favorite deck or choose a new Favorite from the Decks menu to fix this issue.
Cannot save deck. Your Favorite deck must always have the full 12 cards.
There was an error while loading Blitz content.
You need at least one valid deck to play Blitz. Build a deck of 12 cards from the Blitz menus.
Your Blitz mode content is not ready or has failed to download. You've been disconnected from the party.
No products are available to purchase from the online store right now. Try again later. You can still earn Blitz packs by completing challenges and playing the Campaign.

Your settings have changed. Do you want to keep these?
Falling back to previous settings in %1 seconds.

Team up to battle your way through the campaign.
Collect cards, build decks, and play units directly from your hand to the battlefield.
Capture more zones than your opponent to score.
Destroy all opponents’ bases to win
Teams fight to capture Control Towers
Hold the most Strongholds at end of match to win
Claim energy cores to increase your energy rate.
Don’t ignore map resources – more resources means more units
Holding Control Towers increases your Domination Points
Each Stronghold increases your team’s pop. cap
Coordinate unit strengths with your teammate for the strongest attack
Reach the maximum Domination score first to win
HQ Tech is unlocked automatically over time.
A fitting arena for endless battle.
A remote transport route bisects the crystalline wilderness.
Verdant grasslands overrun a Forerunner facility suspended on the edge of the world.
The wreckage of a Covenant freighter lies scattered across the amber wasteland.
The unforgiving desert threatens to engulf this Forerunner bastion and all who fight there.
Volatile liquid churns and boils beneath the uncertain amber surface.
On an isolated battlefield in an isolated war, old strategies return to relevance.

A monolithic Forerunner structure dominates this environment, sitting atop a churning whirlpool which empties deep into the bowels of the Ark. Though one side of this map remains unsullied by war, the other is pitted with large breaches in the surface as the Banished tunnel downwards to plunder the Ark's valuable resources.
The battles fought at this Forerunner array will echo through history.
Rolling sands carry the ghosts of fallen warriors through arid wilds.
The sub-structure of an incomplete refugia stands ready to continue the Ark’s work.

A grim warning to any intruders that would dare to wake a sleeping giant, this former Banished mining camp was obliterated by the Retriever Sentinel that still guards the area. A chasm splits the beachhead, forcing opposing armies to navigate the steps and inclines to gain the tactical advantage.
A sleeping giant protects this ancient landscape.
Lush woodlands conceal an immense Forerunner storage facility.
